channel.title: This is my Homepage title on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in This is my Homepage title on My New Hugo Site

item.title: React Suspense and Lazy Loading: Improving App Load Times
item.description: Learn how to use React Suspense and lazy loading to split your application code and improve initial load times for a better user experience.

item.title: Styling in React: CSS-in-JS vs. CSS Modules
item.description: Explore different approaches to styling React components, comparing popular CSS-in-JS libraries with CSS Modules for modular and scoped styles.
